headline: Why the Iran Attack Proves Bonds Are Still a Safety Net
summary: Treasuries have taken a lot of flak from Wall Street in recent years, because they stopped behaving like a safe haven. It’s time to show some respect again.

raw.headline: Why the Iran Attack Proves Bonds Are Still a Safety Net

headline: Why The Ardagh Metal Packaging (AMBP) Story Is Shifting As Analyst Views Diverge
summary: The latest update to Ardagh Metal Packaging’s model edges fair value to about US$4.86 from US$4.30, giving you a fresh reference point as you think about where the stock currently trades. That tweak sits alongside research where some analysts have raised targets into a US$4.75 to US$6 range, while others cluster closer to US$3.60 and stay cautious on leverage and competition. Read on to see what is driving these views and how you can track the narrative as it evolves. Stay updated as the Fair...

headline: American Airlines Miami Expansion And Citi Card Deal Under Investor Scrutiny
summary: American Airlines Group announced a $1b investment to expand its Miami International Airport facilities, including 17 new gates and upgraded passenger areas. The company also entered a new co brand credit card deal with Citi, aimed at increasing loyalty related and non ticket revenue. These moves focus on strengthening Miami as a key hub and broadening revenue sources beyond core airfare sales. For investors watching NasdaqGS:AAL, the news comes with the stock trading around $13.085 and...
